# Dazzling Display (Feat)
## Overview
Your skill with your favored weapon can frighten enemies.

**Prerequisite:** [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]], proficiency with the selected weapon.

**Benefit:** While wielding the weapon in which you have [[Weapon Focus (Feat)|Weapon Focus]], you can perform a bewildering show of prowess as a full-round action. Make an [[Intimidate (Skill)|Intimidate]] check to demoralize all foes within 30 feet who can see your display.

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook 1, pg. 120
